frameDefinitions: This frame contains verbs and nouns that communicate the act of a Speaker to address a Message to some Addressee using language.
An Agent who is engaged in an Undertaking accords a Degree of importance to a Consideration that influences the success of an Undertaking.
An Agent, Actor, Entity, or Medium causes a Phenomenon to be perceived by a Perceiver.
Through a  Message, a Speaker (sometimes encoded metonymically by a Medium) communicates the relative importance of the state of affairs denoted by the Message.
An Agent has a choice of whether or not to participate in some Desirable_event because of an Opportunity, a situation not completely under the Agent's control and usually of a limited duration.
A Speaker addresses an Audience on a particular Topic.
frameExamples: I now <t>declare</t> you members of this Society.
Our company <t>emphasizes</t> marketing tried and true products and services.INI
Reid <t>emphasized</t> that he and Dean meet every month.
It would be pleasant in the <t>opportune</t> absence of the clergyman to have a dance . DNI
McNamara <t>addressed</t> congress on the state of affairs of the Department of Defense.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the sentient entity that produces the <fen>Message</fen> (whether spoken or written).  It is normally expressed as the External Argument of predicative uses of the <t>target	</t> word, or as the Genitive modifier of the noun.
The <fen>Message</fen> is the role that identifies the content of what the <fen>Speaker</fen> is communicating to the <fen>Addressee</fen>.  It can be expressed as a clause or as a noun phrase.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject matter to which the <fen>Message</fen> pertains. It is normally expressed as a PP Complement headed by 'about', but in some cases it can appear as a direct object.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Message</fen> is made.
The role specifies the location where the <fen>Message</fen> takes place.
An event or state of affairs, an attribute, or an entity whose properties have the potential to influence the success of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the individual who devotes time, concentration, or other resources to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that is important for the success of a larger <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Competing_consideration</fen> is another factor that is relevant to the <fen>Undertaking</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> devotes less attention or effort.
The <fen>Artifact</fen> is a physical object designed with some <fen>Consideration</fen> in mind, such that it functions to facilitate the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Action</fen> is performed with importance placed on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches a specified degree of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen> to further the success of the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches the specified level of importance  to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally creates a situation in which the <fen>Perceiver</fen> observes or experiences the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is an entity or idea that is perceived by the <fen>Perceiver</fen>.
The <fen>Perceiver</fen> is made to have a perceptual experience by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
An <fen>Actor</fen> is a sentient being who is exhibiting, possibly uninintentionally, some <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
An object that has some association with a <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Medium</fen> through which a <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is expressed.
When the event occurs.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> causes the perception of the <fen>Perceiver</fen>.
The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a <fen>Message</fen> to another person.
The proposition whose denotation the Speaker presents as important.
The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed.
The time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates a <fen>Message</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers the <fen>Message</fen>.
The situation during which the <fen>Desirable_situation</fen> is possible. For nominal LUs, this is generally in the second layer and contains the target.
The sentient agent that may or may not participate in the <fen>Desirable_situation</fen>.
A situation or event that the <fen>Agent</fen> can participating in during the period of the <fen>Opportunity</fen>.
The person or persons to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers their text.
The person who orally delivers a text about a <fen>Topic</fen> to a passive <fen>Audience</fen>.
What the text that the <fen>Speaker</fen> produces is about.
The <fen>Time</fen> describes when the speaking occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the speaking occurs.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Evelyn</fex> spoke feelingly about what happened.
Evelyn said <fex>that she was not ready to leave</fex>.
Evelyn spoke candidly <fex>about her past</fex>.
Kim preached to me <fex>over the phone</fex>.
In some remarks <fex>at the National Press Club</fex>, Mr. Keating said he would make a better prime minister tha nMr. Hawke.
The ICBL has prioritised <fex>working to achieve universalisation of the Mine Ban Treaty in South Asia by 2004</fex>.
Dell said Friday <fex>the company</fex> will put more emphasis on selling software
Monophysite Christians  emphasized Christ's divinity <fex>over his humanity</fex>.
Water is a scarce commodity on French Island so <fex>the guest house</fex> places strong emphasis on water conservation.
Result Oriented <fex>Management</fex>
<fex>In the 1960s</fex> Foucault placed great weight on the notion of archeology.
<fex>In Arizona</fex> we emphasize western bats with a special focus on species identification.
<fex>Juhl</fex> emphasized the importance of UPMC System investments, stating that their contribution to the school's funds had tripled in recent years.
He emphasized to me <fex>that my words will go down in history and that this poem has made a difference in our world</fex>.
<fex>The report</fex> emphasized that Iraq's unwillingness to cooperate represents a serious problem for the progress of this work.
However, Cockerill stressed <fex>last week</fex> that he had had many meetings about these obvious synergies and that he had pursued these aggressively.
Putin stressed <fex>in Beijing</fex> that Russia does not favor independence for Taiwan.
He lectured <fex>to the officers of the Scots Guard</fex>  in  1929.
<fex>You</fex> have to sermonize about the good times
He was the Director: he could lecture <fex>on whomever he liked</fex>.
